message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DM, cs.SI, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with the problem of learning the parameters in Bayesian networks, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The method-of-moments is used to avoid inference during learning, which is a statistical technique that falls under the category of data mining (cs.DM). The paper also discusses the use of Monte Carlo and variational methods, which are commonly used in statistical inference and optimization (cs.SI). Finally, the paper deals with the application of the algorithm to a large Bayesian network used for medical diagnosis, which falls under the category of information theory (cs.IT).
